title: Manikyam & Diamond Gold Vanki Bangle - A Touch of Telugu Heritage
materials: White Diamonds (VVS Clarity). Features a rich Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine and brilliance.
features: This exquisite Vanki Bangle showcases an intricate openwork design with square and circular motifs, meticulously handcrafted by our skilled artisans. The central Ruby (Manikyam) is surrounded by sparkling diamonds, creating a captivating focal point. The design incorporates classic South Indian influences, blending traditional aesthetics with a modern openwork style. Notice the delicate detailing, reflecting the skill and expertise passed down through generations.
colors: Predominantly Gold with vibrant Ruby Red at the center and brilliant White Diamonds
creating a rich and luxurious color palette.
occasions: and other special occasions. A timeless piece that can also add a touch of elegance to modern events and celebrations.
description: This Vanki Bangle is a true statement piece, blending traditional Telugu design with exceptional craftsmanship. The high-quality gold and gemstones ensure lasting beauty and value. The intricate design and Hyderabadi polish make this bangle a unique and cherished heirloom. Its elegant design ensures comfortable wear, making it a perfect choice for both traditional and modern occasions. A symbol of prosperity and auspicious beginnings.
